title: Shade in the Side of the Boundary Line
text:
A test point should be a point not on the line. Choose $$(0,0)$$ as a test point to see if it is a solution.
$$y \geq 3x-6$$
$$0 \geq 3	imes0-6$$

title: Shade in the Side of the Boundary Line
text: $$(0,0)$$ is a solution to $$y \geq 3x-6$$. Since $$(0,0)$$ is on the left side of the line, we shade the left side of the boundary line in red.\n##figure4.gif##
